Public Remarks: Frogs Hollow is a unique Island getaway that exudes the essence of coastal living. A whimsical jewel of a cabin, custom built to standards of Simple and Small Living that the Gulf Islands represent. Hidden from the road, the cabin is built with eco friendly materials, hand milled planks with curves and quality unlike off the rack lumber. Driftwood rails, custom staircase, lots of glass and exterior decks on both levels, it's like living in a treehouse. The cabin fits into the landscape like it grew there, on a rocky bench overlooking an untouched marshy wetland, home to a host of critters rare to the Islands: red winged blackbirds, Pacific chorus frogs, mink, otter, herons, hawks, eagles, owls and others.
Fantastic lakefront home, amazing flat waterfront lot with no slope. A warm and open concept make this the perfect weekend escape.
